process.name: TCP4-2212 Verify Conversational Screens
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:interstitialScreenRef="1" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:callActivity id="node_3" name="Groups" calledElement="data_source_callback-data_source_sub_process" pm:config="{"outboundConfig":[],"dataSource":96,"dataMapping":[{"value":"data","key":"information","format":"dotNotation"}],"endpoint":"list"}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:callActivity>
    <bpmn:task id="node_4" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="355" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_12" name="A" pm:scriptRef="47">

    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_15" name="End Event">

    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_17" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_13"/>

  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Pool" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="205" y="120" width="1185" height="270"/>

scripts.title: Conversational Screens
scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode];     
?>
